attributes.action: Boris Johnson and his cronies should resign over partygate & other policies.
attributes.additional_details:
They have lied to the public and many suffered during Covid for a variety of different reasons. Just imagine if you had a loved one pass away during Covid, how would you feel? 

Is it right that many are struggling with the cost of living when you are using tax loopholes?
attributes.background: Boris Johnson and his cronies need to resign. Politics in this country is becoming a joke and people are becoming uninterested. Whilst many struggle with the cost of living & the problems Covid caused, it has been proved the government have been partying & using tax loopholes.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Require a Prime Minister be removed from office if found to have broken the law: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614729

Require MPs who break the law be removed from office: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614705

Call for an early General Election for 2022: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606033
